column1: Little Goat Diner////I have been waiting months to try this place. I have talked up this place to go for an earlier breakfast to every one of my friends that comes to visit Chicago
column2: however we never make it because we end up sleeping in too late and the wait for a table will be 1hr and 45minutes without fail. FINALLY my sister came into town and has a puppy so we were up early enough to get to Little Goat and not have to wait to be seated.
